mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, code, name, sort, type, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, useable ) VALUES ( #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area.id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{useable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_id = #{area.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, useable=#{useable} WHERE id = #{id}
